name: Lumigent
0:
”Alexa, open lumigent”
”Alexa, ask lumigent to turn on”
”Alexa, tell lumigent to make it brighter”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lumigent
des:
This skill enables you to control Lumigent.
First, tap the "Enable" button in the Alexa app, and link to the Lumigent account.
Then, please say "Alexa, ask Lumigent to turn on".
If Lumigent's light turns on, setup is complete.

Light control:
- Alexa, ask Lumigent to turn on → Lumigent's light turns on.
- Alexa, ask Lumigent to turn off → Lumigent's light turns off.
- Alexa, ask Lumigent to make it brighter → Lumigent's light becomes brighter.
- Alexa, ask Lumigent to make it darker → Lumigent's light becomes darker.

Motor control:
- Alexa, ask Lumigent to move to preset one. → Lumigent will move to preset one.

Camera control:
- Alexa, ask Lumigent to turn on the laser. → The laser turns on for three seconds.

Infomation on Lumigent is available at the URL below:
https://lumigent.cerevo.com/en/
